events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and our team will review it shortly.
Your application has been successfully categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for a software development role.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be in touch to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully, and your technical skills align well with the requirements.
We received your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 12th at 14:00 UTC with our lead developer.
You have completed the technical interview with excellent performance, highlighting your strong software engineering skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11:00 UTC to discuss culture fit and company policies.
You completed the HR interview successfully, showing great enthusiasm for our company values and team environment.
We are excited to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position that reflects your skills and experience.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are glad you find the package and role appealing.
You have accepted the job offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you as a new member of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Welcome aboard! We look forward to your contributions as a software engineer.
The hiring process for your Software Engineer role is now closed successfully. Congratulations and best wishes for your new job!
